title: Unusual Night
description:
Description :
        The dead have no words, who says that?’ It was during the Japanese colonial era when the Black Tiger lost the human couple who had taken him in without any reason. Then a mysterious woman named Choe Hee appeared. She dissects the corpse to uncover the cause of death and the culprit… However, the Black Tiger, for the sake of revenge, joins hands with Choe Hee, whose side he cannot determine.
